Description:
Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited is a 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH, one of the world's leading global supplier of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT and Business Solutions. With over 22,700 associates, it’s the largest software development center of Bosch, outside Germany, indicating that it is the Technology Powerhouse of Bosch in India with a global footprint and presence in the US, Europe and the Asia Pacific region.Experience: 4 to 6 yearsLocation: Bangalore / Coimbatore / HyderabadQualification: B.E / B.Tech / MCARequirementsPrimary Skill Set:
Extensive experience in Microsoft Power Platform - Power Apps and Power Automate.
Experience customizing SharePoint lists with Power Apps.
Knowledge on developing and configuring custom connectors.
Experience in integration with 3rd party systems (e.g. – SAP etc.).
Good experience in SharePoint Online (M365).
Problem solving skills.
Secondary Skill Set:
Knowledge of PCF (Power Apps Component Framework).
Installation and configuration of data gateways.
Azure Cloud technologies (Functions, Logic Apps, AD).
Good To Have –
Power Platform and M365 certifications
Excellent communication, collaboration, and mentoring skills.
Proficient working in Agile (Scrum) project methodologies.
Experience working across disciplines, groups, and teams.B.E/B.Tech4- 6 yearsJob Details
